title: Over 70 Organizations Across Multiple Sectors Targeted by China-Linked Cyber Espionage Group
description: The reconnaissance activity targeting American cybersecurity company SentinelOne was part of a broader set of partially-related intrusions into several targets between July 2024 and March 2025. "The victimology includes a South Asian government entity, a European media organization, and more than 70 organizations across a wide range of sectors," security researchers Aleksandar Milenkoski and Tom
